name: Finding my way to the Final Boss
name_original: Finding my way to the Final Boss
description:
Intro

Legends tell about a crew of heroes that saved the world thousands of years ago. Thanks to them , the world continued to prosper for centuries to come. Everyone celebrated them as unbeatable legends and folk tales, the only ones with the skills to defeat the great evil that torments the world every once in a while...

Now in the present, technology rules over everything and individualism has taken over.  Giving the great evil a place to spawn once again thanks to society selfness.

However,  by unknown reasons, an organization  resurrected the hero from his eternal sleep and with that came an unexpected problem... The hero was resurrected just as he was before the moment of his death, a decrepit old man that apparently is useless. 

Now, left alone in his own crypt. The hero feels the presence of the great evil and without any care for his present state, he starts a new journey to save a world that does not remember what a real hero truly is.

This game was made as an entry for the IGMC: Rebirth.

Also: I would be grateful if you tried Proyect Ark, made by BlackRoseMii ! I really like the entry my friend made for this contest ^^ -Jack91al (Co-Creator)

Featuring

  • Interesting characters and dialogue
  • Various places to explore
  • Different ways to make your way around
